history.proof: intros t1 t2 l1 l2 H. induction H. - qsimpl time: 1 use: subst_pred_ordered_cover_l. - sfirstorder depth: 3use: subst_pred_id, subst_pred_ordered_cover_l, ordered_cover_node.
